overview: "Remastered redux of my third epic film, "Isis",a suburban crime thriller shot on VHS in Jan-June of 1999.Featuring the music of MPB,Carl Restivo,Robbie Sehag, and more,this was my first scripted film that I produced directed edited and shot over many months.Barely seen,this new version has some better FX though the original audio is still shaky"
title: ISIS
